oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from members of the 114th FA, 30th Div. defending Luke Lea
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: An "open letter" by members of the 114th FA, 30th Div. responding to the article of the Memphis Press-Scimitar in which the writers defend the conduct of Col. Luke Lea in the plot to kidnap the Kaiser in Holland and challenge Mr. Sperry to present proof to substantiate his claims against Luke Lea.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
